rooms.description: A welcoming area with traditional Kerala woodwork and stone finishes, featuring ornate carvings and a Vastu-aligned entrance.
Spacious living room with tiled floors, large windows for natural light, decorated with traditional motifs aligning with Kerala aesthetics.
Adjacent to the kitchen with open layout that promotes family interaction and adheres to Vastu principles for communal harmony.
Lavish master bedroom overlooking a garden view, ensuring privacy and tranquility. Decorated in Kerala style with traditional color schemes.
Comfortable guest room designed for extended stays, incorporating traditional elements while maintaining modern comfort.
Quiet study area with ample storage and a dedicated workspace, integrating Kerala design aesthetics.
A versatile room for children or extra guests, featuring traditional Kerala style decor and Vastu-compliant layout.

openings.description: Traditional Kerala-style wooden door with intricate carvings, aligning with local building norms.
Expansive window to allow natural light and views of the garden, following Vastu principles.
Elegant French doors leading out to a private balcony overlooking the garden.
Balcony with traditional Kerala railing design offering a view of the swimming pool and garden.
